channel.title: Plz read (changing armour)
channel.description:
uhm.. i now its the wrong section.. but everyone know that in the qeustions topic that there are only noobs and they only ask for help to find java.client everyone knows that..
so my qeustion is could i make armour different.. so normal the dragon chain is red.. i want him green .. so where do i do that

item.title: Plz read (changing armour)
item.dc:creator: @SlaySlay SlaySlay
item.description:
@SlaySlay wrote:

It’s what I wanna know, or can we decompile the cache, open it up in a modelling program, re-save it, compile it and put it back in the cache folder?
